text: == Events == * January/October: The Thirty Years' War ended with the Peace of Westphalia. * October 24 – Switzerland is recognized as an independent country by the other countries of Europe. * Saint-Barthélemy was claimed by France. * The Eighty Years' War between the Netherlands and Spain ended. == Deaths == * March 12 – Tirso de Molina, Spanish dramatist and poet (b. 1571)
